name: tp1/XMLscene.js
XMLscene
description: XMLscene class, representing the scene that is to be rendered.

name: init
description: Initializes the scene, setting some WebGL defaults, initializing the camera and the axis.

name: initDefaultCameras
description: Initializes the scene cameras.

name: initLights
description: Initializes the scene lights with the values read from the XML file.

name: onGraphLoaded
description:
Handler called when the graph is finally loaded. 
As loading is asynchronous, this may be called already after the application has started the run loop

name: display
description: Displays the scene.

name: tp1/parser/AmbientParser.js
AmbientParser
description: Parser for the <ambient> node

name: parse
description: Parse the <ambient> node

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing a object with the parsed ambient and background colors, and errors that occurred while parsing

return.description: Containing a object with the parsed ambient and background colors, and errors that occurred while parsing

name: tp1/parser/BlockParser.js
BlockParser
description: Parser for nested elements within a block

name: parse
description:
Pass a tag block (<material> for example, receiving a map that matches each subtag to an handler function
Example: 
<material>
     <subtag1/> 
     <subtag2/>
</material>

tagHandlerMap
{
  "subtag1": [func, [0, 0, 0, 1]], where func is a function that receives the <subtag1/> node 
                                 and the second element the default value to be used in case of error
  "subtag2": [func, [0, 0, 0, 1]],
}

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing the parsed block and errors that occurred while parsing

params.name: node
params.description: Root node of the block that should be parsed

return.description: Containing the parsed block and errors that occurred while parsing

name: tp1/parser/ColorParser.js
ColorParser
description: Parser for the node with color attributes

name: parse
description: Parse the node with color attributes

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing a Color object with the parsed color, and errors that occurred while parsing

return.description: Containing a Color object with the parsed color, and errors that occurred while parsing

Coordinate3DParser
description: Parser for a node with 3d coordinates

description: Parse a node with 3d coordinates

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing a Coordinate3D object with the parsed coordinates, and errors that occurred while parsing

return.description: Containing a Coordinate3D object with the parsed coordinates, and errors that occurred while parsing

name: tp1/parser/FloatParser.js
FloatParser
description: Parser for a float attribute from a node

name: parse
description: Parse a float attribute from a node

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing a float with the parsed attribute, and errors that occurred while parsing

params.name: attributeName
params.description: Name of the attribute that should be parsed

return.description: Containing a float with the parsed attribute, and errors that occurred while parsing

name: tp1/parser/GenericChildParser.js
GenericChildParser
description:
Parser for block level elements with common substructure
Applied to <materials>, <textures>, <transformations>, etc... that contain sub elements <material>, <texture>, etc...

name: parse
description: Parse a block element node

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing an dict with id:parsedChildNode structure, and errors that occurred while parsing

params.name: arg
params.description: Argument that should be passed to the parse function of the child parser

params.name: parserClass
params.description: Parser class that should be used to parse child nodes

params.name: typeName
params.description: Type of the child nodes for context and error messages

return.description: Containing an dict with id:parsedChildNode structure, and errors that occurred while parsing

name: tp1/parser/IntegerParser.js
IntegerParser
description: Parse a integer attribute from a node

name: parse
description: Parse a integer attribute from a node

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing a integer with the parsed attribute, and errors that occurred while parsing

params.name: attributeName
params.description: Name of the attribute that should be parsed

return.description: Containing a integer with the parsed attribute, and errors that occurred while parsing

name: tp1/parser/LightsParser.js
LightsParser
description:
Parser for the <lights> block
This is an wrapper for the base code implementation of this functionality

unknown.tagValue: {ParserResult} - Containing a array containing the parsed lights, and errors that occurred while parsing

return.description: Containing a array containing the parsed lights, and errors that occurred while parsing

ComponentParser

description: Parse the <texture> node within an <element> node

name: parseMaterial
description: Parse the <materials> node within an <element> node

return.description: Containing the parsed materials (or "inherit") and errors that occurred while parsing
